senses.de: A period of time where a group of people come together for an activity
senses.ex: We have a training session this afternoon.

Tips.title: Group Activity
Tips.description: Used to describe an event focusing on a specific purpose like learning or creating.
Tips.example: The writer's session inspired many new ideas.

Tips.title: Scheduled Event
Tips.description: Implies a planned time and usually doesn't go beyond the set duration.
Tips.example: Our next planning session is scheduled for Tuesday.

senses.de: A period of time in which an official meeting or a court is held

Tips.title: Formal Proceedings
Tips.description: Indicates a formal or official meeting, often following a set protocol or procedure.
Tips.example: A new bill was discussed in the session of parliament.

Tips.title: Legal Context
Tips.description: It's often associated with courts or legislative bodies.
Tips.example: The jury will reconvene when the court session resumes.

senses.de: A period of time where someone is using a computer without logging out
senses.ex: Due to inactivity, your session has timed out.

Tips.title: Continuous Engagement
Tips.description: Refers to continuous use without interruption, like when working on a computer.
Tips.example: She completed the project in a single coding session.

Tips.title: Technical Interruption
Tips.description: A session can end unexpectedly due to timeouts or technical issues.
Tips.example: His gaming session ended abruptly due to a power cut.

senses.de: A period of time where a person is involved in drinking alcohol
senses.ex: They went out for a drinking session.

Tips.title: Social Drinking
Tips.description: Casual term, often for social gatherings focused on consuming alcohol.
Tips.example: Their jam session turned into a beer session.

Tips.title: Informal Usage
Tips.description: The term can be used informally among friends referring to relaxed hangouts.
Tips.example: Let's have a session at my place tonight.

senses.de: A short period of time where someone receives a particular type of treatment or therapy
senses.ex: She had a therapy session yesterday.

Tips.title: Therapeutic Setting
Tips.description: Often associated with health or well-being, like counseling or physical therapy.
Tips.example: His first physiotherapy session helped relieve the pain.

Tips.title: Personal Development
Tips.description: Can refer to a time spent on self-improvement activities.
Tips.example: Her meditation sessions are key to her daily routine.

Assembly.wordDefinition:
An assembly is a group of people who come together for a particular purpose, such as to make decisions or to discuss issues.

It usually refers to a formal meeting, often of an organization or institution. For example, a company's board of directors might hold an assembly to discuss the future direction of the company.

So, in simple terms, an assembly is a specific meeting or gathering of people, while a session is a period of time during which a group of people work on a particular task.

Conference.wordDefinition:
A conference refers to a large gathering of people who come together to discuss and learn about a particular topic. It usually lasts for a few days and consists of multiple sessions, workshops, and presentations.

It is a part of a larger conference or event.

A conference is usually a bigger event with multiple sessions, while a session is just a small part of a conference or event that is focused on a particular topic or speaker.

Consultation.wordDefinition:
Consultation usually refers to a meeting or discussion between two or more people, where one person seeks advice or opinion from the other person regarding a specific matter.

This term often implies a more formal and professional setting, such as a consultation with a doctor or lawyer.

A consultation is a discussion or meeting focused on seeking advice or opinion, often in a professional setting, while a session is a designated time period for a specific activity, often in a more casual setting.

Gather.wordDefinition:
Gather means to come together or collect; it usually refers to people or things being brought together in one place or a group.

For example, you can use the word gather to describe a family gathering for a holiday dinner.

A session can be a one-time event or a series of planned gatherings. For example, you could attend a session of a yoga class or a guitar lesson.

Gather refers to the act of coming together or collecting, while session refers to a specific period of time in which an activity takes place.

Meet.wordDefinition:
Meet generally refers to a gathering or coming together of people for a specific purpose, such as to discuss something or for social interaction.

It can be used in various contexts, such as business meetings, sports meets, or social events.

Meet is used to refer to a gathering of people or a social gathering, while session is used to refer to a specific event or activity.

Seminar.wordDefinition:
A seminar is a meeting where a group of people with similar interests gather to have discussions, lectures, and presentations on a particular topic or subject.

For example, a seminar on entrepreneurship would involve experts in the field sharing their experiences and knowledge with aspiring entrepreneurs.

A seminar is a specific type of gathering with a structured purpose, while a session can refer to any gathering that has a specific time frame.

Sit.wordDefinition:
Sit generally means to rest on a chair or other surface, without implying any specific duration or purpose.

It can be used in any context, from sitting down to eat to sitting in a waiting room.

Session implies a formal or organized gathering, while sit simply means to rest on a surface.

quotes.Text: My focus in the training sessions is always about movement to create openings and opportunities. When you don't have the ball, you still need the discipline to know where you should be, who you should be marking, but when we have the ball, it is important to be able to move around.
quotes.Title: Brazilian Athlete
quotes.Name: Philippe Coutinho

quotes.Text: I'm very objective driven, so for me it's very important to know who I'm fighting, when I'm fighting, and roughly the direction I'm working in. It gives me that little extra push to do what I need to do to get the sessions, to work towards something.
quotes.Title: Australian Athlete
quotes.Name: Robert Whittaker

quotes.Text: As a black woman, I've always had to work hard to earn my respect as a musician - and as a young woman, too. As a writer, in certain sessions or certain rooms people think, 'Who's kid is this? Who's this little girl?' I've had to prove myself.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Gabriella Wilson

quotes.Text: When I don't have control of the ball, what do I do? I press to get it back. It's a way of defending. But more important is that I like to have the ball. That's why I believe in individual coaching sessions to prepare players properly.
quotes.Title: Dutch Athlete
quotes.Name: Johan Cruyff

quotes.Text: I like to follow the training session with my voice. To call at them and explain my reasons and my ideas of football. It's important to make them understand: when to move, to time it right, not wrong - the right movement.
quotes.Title: Italian Coach
quotes.Name: Antonio Conte

quotes.Text: But when you work with the director and the real person who is playing opposite you, it changes everything. You are almost in a working session. I was very comfortable, and that's maybe what helped me to get the part.
quotes.Title: French Actor
quotes.Name: Olivier Martinez

quotes.Text: There were many struggles, but my parents supported me a lot. Whenever I wanted anything, wherever I wanted to go, practice session etc., they were there for me.
quotes.Title: Indian Athlete
quotes.Name: P. V. Sindhu

quotes.Text: I'm a modern coach when it comes to training. I pick a lot of things up and I watch a lot of training sessions and follow a lot of leagues around the world.
quotes.Title: Brazilian Footballer
quotes.Name: Roberto Carlos

quotes.Text: Borderlands' asks you to pick a class, and once you've chosen that character class, you've committed yourself to that game session.
quotes.Title: American Businessman
quotes.Name: Randy Pitchford

quotes.Text: Every free day, every weekend, I am in a recording session. I'm very lucky to have such supportive people around me.
quotes.Title: American Musician
quotes.Name: Sabrina Carpenter
